objects.text: The process of receiving a Token from any source
Chaos: Cancels
Ability that is used after the Phenomenon's Duration reaches 0
A separate part of your Realm. Includes 1 Building Place and 5 Creature Place on the same row.
Bliss: Cancels

Food: Consumable
Removes the first Token on the Creature
This condition must be met on the final Eclipse Turn to win the game
<color=#FFFFFF>Basic ability of the Card that is used on its Turn</color>

Gold: Consumable
Makes the target Creature use its Action
Tools: When Creature Works, it produces 1 additional
Removes Disabled
Hot: Cancels
Work: Used by Buildings to Produce Resource Tokens
Fear: Cancels
A Creature that is horizontally adjacent to the current one
Creature Places # 2, 3 and 4
Creature that Death with this returns back with 1 Token Slot
Destroys all tokens gained by Creature until the start of the next turn
When a Creature's Token Slots are filled, it gets Destroyed and loses all its Tokens.
Cold: Cancels
<color=#FFFFFF>Effect that persist as long as this ard is in play</color>
<color=#FFFFFF>Consumable Token is Destroyed when applying its effect</color>
Creates and gives it to the Building on the same Lane

Consumable
Disables Creature
Omen: Measures the time until a new Eclipse Omen activation
Creature Places # 1 and 5
Cancels the next Token Gained, except
<color=#FFFFFF>A Card or Token that gets Destroyed immediately leaves the game.</color>
I'm just a simple tooltip with icon , bold, size, and even COLOR
Activates when all Token Slots are filled with
Counts as Free Space, and can not create or receive tokens. On turn -- Enable self, but perform no Action
Order: Cancels
Creates a new Token of the specified Type and places it into Storage
Card is Enabled so long as it is not Disabled
Transforms into a random Building after filling all Token Slots
<color=#FFFFFF>Creature at a distance of one Place from this one</color>
This Card ignores effects that Destroy it
Can be moved to any slot within the Realm Board. Can Construct and Work in Buildings. Death if all its Slots are filled with Tokens
Collects Work from Creatures on its Lane. Produces beneficial Resource Tokens after filling all Token Slots with Work.
This place where all Resource Tokens are kept. You can drag any Resource Token from the Storage to any Creature to use it.

A badge depicting a resource or an outside influence of any kind. Most Tokens have both advantages and drawbacks, and should be used with caution. Creatures die after all their Token Slots are filled.
When Tokens {Cancel} each other, both of them are instantly Destroyed.
The place where all active Phenomena are shown, sorted by their Durations. Phenomena are very dangerous - do your best to protect your Creatures from them!
A dangerous event threatening your Realm. Do your best to avoid its effects!
The first Creature in the target Lane, counting from the Right
The first Creature in the target Lane, counting from the Left
The most important Card. Fulfill the Survival condition listed on this Card to {Win} the game! Be careful - Eclipse creates additional {Phemonena} every few {Turns}!
The first Creature in any Lanes, counting from the Top
A spot on the Lane where a Creature can stand. One Place can contain only one Creature.
A place for storing Tokens on the Card. Plays a different role depending on the Card's type.
One action of a single Card. Each {Round} every single Card gets a {Turn}.
One full circle of Card actions, divided into several {Phases} - Player Phase, Building Phase, Creature Phase, Event Phase, Eclipse Phase and Draw Phase
A beneficial Token kept in your Storage. Drag a Resource Token from Storage to the target Creature to use it.
The number of {Rounds} left until the end of a Phenomenon. Be careful - many Phenomena resolve their effects when their Duration reaches 0!
The part of the board depicting your village: 3 Lanes with 1 Building and 5 Creature Places on each
Increases this Card's Counter by 1
A number in the top left corner of the Card. Shows how many times a Creature Counted something
Transforms a specified Token into and consumes it
